text: [[col:red]]The Anglo-Saxons in Northanhymbra declare war on Jórvík[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Jórvík annexes Westmoringas and Northanhymbra declares war on Jórvík[[/col]]
Peace with the Kingdom of Jórvík.
[[col:red]]East Engle and Jórvík declare war on each other, and each annexes their Viking vassals[[/col]]
